description: Brock is a fiery little hunk is full of spunk and knows how to put on a great show.  He loves the camera and he was the one that convinced Ron to come along and give it all a try. They start out sitting side-by-side on an ottoman as Mike asks them both questions. Brock already has his shirt off and you can tell he's just itching to get things going.Mike lays on the regular bullshit as always and turns the guys loose to do their thing. Brock is so animated that I think it makes Ron a tad nervous. Brock loves having those delicious balls played with or playing with them himself. Brock is determined to steal the show with his hot moans and intense jerking as he blurts out his cute little 'oh yeah' here and there and rubs and plays with his chest. He's certainly the showman of the two but both of them shoot humongous loads before it's all said and done. You'll really enjoy this little duo jerk-off I'm sure.
title: Brock & Ron
